overview: Samantha, a junior attorney, has a hard time launching her career along with few clients and even less opportunities. Luckily, her husband knows a solution. A friend of his desperately seeks for a lawyer, for more than just juridical advices. To seal a deal, Samantha will have to work her ass off, literally, in the felon’s cell, hoping that the screw won’t take advantage of the situation.
title: Lawyer for Taunts
